detectors.description:
SodaToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#983-1001) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#993)
detectors.markdown:
[SodaToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#L983-L1001) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#L993)

detectors.description:
ERC20.constructor(string,string).name (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#452) shadows:
	- ERC20.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#461-463) (function)

ERC20.constructor(string,string).symbol (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#452) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#469-471) (function)

SodaToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#849-890) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,SODA::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#888)
detectors.markdown:
[SodaToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#L849-L890) uses timestamp for comparisons

	- [require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,SODA::delegateBySig: signature expired)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SodaToken.sol#L888)
